title: Plat 5 Top/ADC Lf Duo/Flex/Coach/Friend üòÅ
body:
Hello,

My name is David or Missfbot. I am a top/adc main. I love playing league; nonetheless, I want to improve. 

I want to play with players that are better than me so I can learn. I would love to play with some diamond+ players/teams. I think my skills can keep up with yours. üòä

Shoot me an add. I would love a coach, friend, or duo q partner.

Please keep the vibes good. üòÅ

Your fellow league player,

Missfbot

replies.body: I am gold 5 support main. I've played at a high level with teams. Don't need too much help getting out of gold but I'd love to duo. Got to goto school now I'll be on at 4:30 est.
what if we are plebs would u still let us add you ?
